ygData.subject: Re: Religion
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Ogres SKs can chose Cazic Thule and Rallos Zek Uglugg ... From: Tom Dunne  To:  Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Ogres SKs can chose Cazic Thule and Rallos Zek

Uglugg

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Dunne <dunnetg@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 10:03 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Religion


> From: Tom Dunne <dunnetg@...>
>
> No one can play an agnostic Shadow Knight. SK's and Paladins are the
soldiers of
> their gods - religion is their reason for existance. Just like you
couldn't be an
> agnostic priest, it wouldn't make sense.
>
> Dark Elf SK's can worship only Innoruuk
> Human SK's can worship Innoruuk or Bertoxxulous
> Troll SK's can worship Innoruuk or Cazic Thule
> Ogre SK's can worship Innoruuk or Rallos Zek
>
> No matter your class, I'd pick Innoruuk, just on the chance it makes you
more
> agreeable to other evil races...
>
> Hadow@... wrote:
>
> > From: Hadow@...
> >
> > Was just wondering if it's best to be an agnostic when creating a
Shadowknight?
> >
> > Z
> >
> > > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> > -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
